LanguageData.Hare.label: hare
LanguageData.Hare.description: This small, solitary herbivore can swiftly hop away from danger.
LanguageData.Hare.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Hare_Leather.label: hare leather
LanguageData.Hare_Corpse.label: hare corpse
LanguageData.Snowhare.label: snow hare
LanguageData.Snowhare.description: This hardy, animal survives the brutal winters of the north by burrowing through snow and finding prey underneath, or hibernating the worst months away.
LanguageData.Snowhare.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Snowhare_Leather.label: snow hare leather
LanguageData.Snowhare_Corpse.label: snow hare corpse
